          <title>
            <string language="it">Eventi fondamentali per l'Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Key Facts about Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlüsseltatsachen über Europa</string>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Esercizi che tendono a colmare le lacune sugli avvenimenti principali dell'Unione Europea.</string>
            <string language="en">Gap-fill exercise about basic facts about the European Union.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand-füllen Sie Übung über grundlegende

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Boquete-llene el ejercicio sobre hechos básicos 
sobre la unión europea.</string>
          </description>
